mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `kss_soft_key` ( `id` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `adminid` smallint(5) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `keysetid` smallint(5) NOT NULL, `cdkey` char(6) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `addtime` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `ordernum` char(24) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `cday` decimal(8,2) NOT NULL, `tag` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `islock` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `usedtime` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `useduser` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `cdkey` (`cdkey`), KEY `ordernum` (`ordernum`(10)), KEY `tag` (`tag`(10)), KEY `czusername` (`useduser`(10)), KEY `islock` (`islock`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `kss_soft_recharge` ( `id` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `addtime` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `username` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `oldcday` decimal(9,2) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `newcday` decimal(9,2) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `cdkey` varchar(170) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `addtime` (`addtime`), KEY `username` (`username`(10)) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `kss_soft_user` ( `id` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `adminid` smallint(5) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `username` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `password` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `cday` decimal(8,2) NOT NULL, `islock` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ispub` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `linecode` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-', `pccode` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-', `addtime` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `starttime` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `endtime` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lastlogintime` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lastloginip` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `activetimes` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `locktimes` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lockendtime` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `rechargetimes` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `username` (`username`(10)), KEY `managerid` (`adminid`), KEY `lasttime` (`lastlogintime`), KEY `islock` (`islock`), KEY `endtime` (`endtime`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
